actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to State and Federal power to protect life.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the Congress and the States shall have power to protect life including the unborn at every stage of biological development irrespective of age, health, or condition of physical dependency.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to State and Federal power to protect life.
